parameters.name: HttpEndpoint
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the access channel for instance metadata. Valid values:

*   enabled
*   disabled

Default value: enabled.

> For more information about instance metadata, see [Overview of ECS instance metadata](~~49122~~).

parameters.name: HttpPutResponseHopLimit
parameters.description: > This parameter is in invitational preview and is not publicly available.

parameters.name: HttpTokens
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to forcefully use the security-enhanced mode (IMDSv2) to access instance metadata. Valid values:

*   optional: does not forcefully use the security-enhanced mode (IMDSv2).
*   required: forcefully uses the security-enhanced mode (IMDSv2). After you set this parameter to required, you cannot access instance metadata in normal mode.

Default value: optional.

> For more information about the modes of accessing instance metadata, see [Access mode of instance metadata](~~150575~~).

parameters.name: InstanceMetadataTags
parameters.description: > This parameter is in invitational preview and is not publicly available.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
